scripts.test:functions: npx firebase emulators:exec --only auth,functions,firestore 'npm run test:call_functions'
scripts.test:data: cd test && curl -X POST http://127.0.0.1:5001/kyubikohub/asia-northeast2/test_deployment -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"data":{}}' && cd ..
scripts.test:firestore: npx firebase emulators:exec --only auth,functions,firestore 'npm run test:data && npx jest test' > test_firestore.log
scripts.test: npm run test:functions && npm run test:firestore && npm run test:ui
scripts.start: npx firebase emulators:exec --only auth,functions,firestore,storage --ui 'npm run test:data && fvm flutter run -d chrome --web-port=3000'
